start.text: If we brace ourselves and react calmly, we can win this.
Be calm, everything will work out... Maybe...
I... don't know if I'm strong enough for this.
I'm nervous, but... I'll do my best..!

start_boss.text: Alright, here they come! I want you to take this seriously!
We have no choice but to fulfill our roles...

retreat.text: I should've done a better job.
At least I'll be away from the bloodshed...
I'm sorry, but we need to retreat...

out_of_missiles.text: Out of missiles. I should stay calm, and...
We used up all of our ammo. Did we get careless?

engaged.text: I'm sorry, but this is my only option.
I hope we can finish this without any losses...
Engaging... I feel so bad for their crew...

need_help.text: I need assistance... I still have a lot to improve...

pursuing.text: I'm sorry, you probably don't want to die like this...
...You did well enough. I don't want to finish you off, but...
I'm sorry, but I need to destroy your ship...

running.text: I'm a little unsure of what to do now..!
I can't let my crew die in vain...
We're pulling back. I can't let the fleet break...

hull_90.text: The hull is starting to buckle..!

hull_50.text: Our armor is coming apart... I should've done a better job.
I'm sorry, everyone! We're taking too much damage!

hull_30.text: We're in critical condition, I can't..!
...I- I don't know what to do..!

overload.text: I let the ship overload, I should've done a better job!

death.text: ...I was... Nothing but trouble in the end. I'm- I'm just...
I tried so hard, why does it always end like this..?

victory.text: I'm glad I could make it through this with everyone.
I'll try to improve further the next time we get in a fight.
We won..! Thanks for the great work, everyone..!
